title: Mastery Tokens will not craft into next lvl
body:
Hey riot, just wondering how to use my mastery 6 tokens on nautilus and thresh. I did it with morde and some blue essence because it doesn't seem to notice i already have the champions permanently. i now don't have enough blue essence and thresh and nautilus are ready for lvl 6 but it doesn't recognize that i already own them. 

what am i doing wrong?

This happening to anyone else?

replies.body: A champion permanent is not simply owning the champion, it's an actual piece of content that you can see in your loot screen similar to a champion shard. A permanent is what you get by combining 3 champion shards. So you either need one of those, a champion shard, or 500 blue essence to upgrade to lvl 6.

>
> A champion permanent is not simply owning the champion, it's an actual piece of content that you can see in your loot screen similar to a champion shard. A permanent is what you get by combining 3 champion shards. So you either need one of those, a champion shard, or 500 blue essence to upgrade to lvl 6.

if thats the case then god i've got to play more... my last 5 chests have been nothing but skins, all the orange essence in the world...

After checking out your screenshot, I can confirm *Zombiemaster* is 100% correct. You'll want to grind out some more games so you can nab some hextech chests + key fragments and get that mastery level unlocked!

I definitely recommend you check out our [**Champion Mastery Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide). Let me know if you have any other questions.
Can you [**screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) what you're seeing? Also, did you mean that you **did** or **didn't** have enough blue essence to upgrade them?
